#include <iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	string s;
	cin>>s;  int l=s.length();   int arr[26]; std::fill_n(arr,26,0);  int count;
	for(int i=0;i<l;)
	{
		char temp=s[i];   count=0;
		count++;
	//	cout<<"i value is "<<i;
		
		int j=i+1;
		
		while(s[j]==temp && j<l ) {count++; j++;}
		
	    i=j;
	   // cout<<"\n count is "<<count;
		
		if(arr[temp-'a']<count)   arr[temp-'a']=count;
		
	}   int ans=arr[0];    count=0;
	
	for(int i=1;i<26;i++) if(arr[i]>ans)   {ans=arr[i];  count=i;}
	cout<<char(97+count)<<"\n"<<ans;
	return 0;
}
